name: RUN! (itch) (FFS2309)
description:
This is my entry for #40HoursGJ. Your goal is simple: Just run! You have to go the furthest you can in 10 seconds to escape an explosion!

If the game doesn't work here try the external link at http://peter.impulsecraft.de/

Controls:

Left arrow & Right arrow key
You have to mash them just holding doesn't do much
